Name: Sergeant WhiskerVolt
Description: Hailing from the digital front lines of WebtrES Club, Sergeant WhiskerVolt is a valiant cybernetic sentinel known for his striking rossoCorsa box chassis and unwavering dedication to his battalion. Sporting classic button controls and robust soldier-class arms and legs, he's always at the ready. But don't let his stern exterior fool you; his screen displays the playful spirit of a cat, reflecting his quick reflexes and agile mind, which he uses to strategize and outmaneuver adversaries in the virtual world.
